first_para: Stella Judith Creasy MP (born 5 April 1977, West Midlands) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who has served as Member of Parliament for the Greater London constituency of Walthamstow since 2010.

full.extract:
Stella Judith Creasy MP (born 5 April 1977, West Midlands) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who has served as Member of Parliament for the Greater London constituency of Walthamstow since 2010.
^ The London Gazette: no. 59418. p. 8737. 13 May 2010. Retrieved 19 May 2012.
^ Twitter
^ Election 2010- Walthamstow BBC News
full.title: Stella Creasy
